title: FS - T205 DRUM "Bris" Lord, SGC A

posts.post_title: FS - T205 DRUM "Bris" Lord, SGC A
posts.post_content:
Hello,

I have this T205 DRUM backed lord, SGC A.  It's well loved for sure - may have even been used to light a Drum cigarette.

Either way, make this beauty yours.  $500.  PM for details.  Thank you and stay well.

One time price cut.  325 delivered!!!!!

PM me!

Bris is looking for a new home!
